Description:
Big bay views and big potential!
The big bay views are breathtaking from Bayshore Avenue and this elevated 3-bedroom home is no exception! Boasting clear views of the You Yangs and turquoise waters of Port Phillip Bay, this home’s sweeping panorama includes the tranquil treed Golf Course to the east and and gorgeous lights of Geelong to the west. Comfortably livable as is, this solid build and large block scream ‘project’. Given the views and space, the results would be impressive (STCA)!
A northern balcony spans the facade bring you closer to the vista. Sunsets are stunning and comfortably enjoyed from the fully-enclosed western end of the balcony. The kitchen/meals/living room, separate lounge and master bedroom are spoilt with the scenic northern aspect.
The kitchen offers cooktop, wall oven and grill. An air conditioner and electric heater assist comfort. The lounge flows to the enclosed balcony increasing the footprint for entertaining. The master bedroom, with en suite access to the 2-way bathroom, flows from the lounge.
The minor bedrooms and laundry bud off a sunny landing with rear patio access. The landing, with split system, makes an ideal play space or study.
The living level is perched on top of a triple garage and workshop, ideal for tradies or those with ‘toys’. Ample off-street parking. At the rear, the patio is fenced and private. Beyond, the large yard is a blank canvas.
Use your imagination here, or simply enjoy the key asset - the view!
Insights: 77 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
When Run Of The Mill Just Won't Do!
Don't expect boring when you enter this solid brick architecturally designed home constructed in an era where homes were built to stand the test of time. Set on a generous corner allotment just minutes from the Clifton Springs golf course this family home offers the new buyer north facing lounge capturing the Spring sunlight. A gas log fire keeps the room cosy during the coldest of evenings and reverse cycle air conditioner keeps you comfortable during the summer months. There is also a built in bar for the entertainers of the home. A generously proportioned and centrally located open plan living area incorporates kitchen, meals and family room (another gas log fire). There are 3 bedrooms plus a study or 4th bedroom. All bedrooms have built in robes and the master a full ensuite bathroom. The family cars are housed under the carport and there is a single freestanding garage/workshop for the home handyman. Courtyard gardens, undercover entertainment area and lovely established gardens complete this attractive property. Call us today to arrange an inspection time.
Insights: 2 Carolina Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Striking architecture, exquisite views!
On arrival you know the bayviews are going to be exquisite! This custom built 3-bedroom home, with striking angular architecture and perfecting craftsmanship, has been built to harness the complete panorama.
Sleek steel structures support the cantilever where the lofty scenic kitchen/living hub rests. Expansive views incorporate the majestic You Yangs, lights of Geelong, Skilled Stadium and the ever changing waters of the bay. Fireworks erupt all around on New Year's Eve, and the sunsets are phenomenal!
The topography of the block and thoughtful design allow self-contained living on the scenic upper level. The garage and front door give direct access to the upper level which features a spectacular floating balcony, accessed from the living hub and master bedroom, a master bedroom with quality BIRs and gorgeous en suite, office, laundry and toilet.
The Blanco steam and fan-forced ovens are impressive in the kitchen. An induction cooktop and 2-drawer dishwasher also denote quality.
A split system and ducted heat transfer assists comfort throughout. There are outlets for a gas log fire and balcony BBQ.
Nestled below, find 2 further bedrooms with quality BIRs, a living zone, 2nd deck and stylish bathroom. This lower level provides zone-able accommodation for children or visiting family and friends. The 2.5-car garage with spacious 12ft ceilings and extra open parking for 'toys' are privately placed at the rear. Under-home storage, on concrete with power, is an ideal room for a wine cellar.
The location is quiet and friendly - just a 2 minute drive to Drysdale village with a vast array of retail, grocery and medical outlets. Short walks to the golf course and serene bay beaches.
Don't miss this stunning home!
* Custom built 3BR home, striking architecture, perfecting craftsmanship and bay views
* Panorama includes You Yangs, Geelong, Skilled Stadium, phenomenal sunsets
* Self-contained living on the upper level, including internal garage access
* Kitchen/living, balcony, master with en suite, office, laundry and toilet on upper level
* 2 BRs, living zone, 2nd deck and stylish bathroom below
* Spacious 2.5-car garage and extra parking for 'toys' privately placed at the rear
Insights: 33 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Panoramic views of Corio Bay
Imagine watching the ships ply their cargo up the shipping lanes from the moment you wake up. Offering panoramic views of the You Yangs from the front lounge.
This well presented family home offers four bedrooms with the fourth currently used as a study.
Timber galley style kitchen & dining. Wall oven, gas cooktop & servery window opening out to the main living room.
Imagine waking up in the generous master bedroom with great views of the water.
Large family room with vaulted ceilings, built in entertainment / display cabinet, library cabinet & easy access to the backyard.
The under cover timber deck over looks the back yard, with plenty of yard to play.
Separate large study / fourth bedroom would ideally suit a teenager needing space.
Ducted heating to ward away the winter chills.
Single garage would be ideally suited to a workshop or mancave.
Double gates & a long side drive allowing storage of boat or caravan behind double gates.
Close to the Clifton Springs Bowls & Golf Course, easy access to the Primary School. This is the lifestyle waiting for you.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling All Buyers - Your Search Ends Here!
You will need to act fast and get in early to secure this fabulous home that is ideal for all buyers, including first home, growing families and astute investors alike.
Set on a generous 607m2 (approx) block in a super location sits this 3 bedroom plus study single level home, master with ensuite, newly laid carpet, a fresh lick of paint and spacious light filled formal lounge. A separate living room adjacent to the functional kitchen complete with brand new cook top and oven leads you out to the undercover entertainment area.
This comfortable, economical family home features gas ducted heating throughout and 16 solar panels providing 4600w of energy saving power. And for those buyers looking for that all important access for trailer/boat/caravan, this is the one! With a double lock-up garage as well as side access leading through gates to a low maintenance back yard. Perfect for tradies as well.
This home represents outstanding value in a high growth area with Clifton Springs primary school opposite, close to all amenities and is sure to be snapped up fast. Estimated rental return in the vicinity of $350 pw. Call to inspect privately or as advertised.
Insights: 89 Jetty Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal For Weekend Holidays
This elevated 3 bedroom home is ideal for weekends or holidays near the beach. Ample parking for cars and boats and a huge 3 x 12 metre entertaining deck upstairs for summer nights and endless sunsets. Open plan lounge and dining area and well appointed electric kitchen all enjoy the bay views. Spacious double bedrooms with plenty of storage. Tiled bathroom and extra toilet. 2 minutes to the beach, 5 minutes to the golf course and boat ramp, and 10 minutes to the local wineries. So close to everything. Buy now and be in time for this holiday season.

Description:
Let's Get You Started!
This lovely neat & tidy 3 bedroom home represents fantastic buying whether it's for your first home or a great addition to your investment portfolio. On entering you will be greeted by gleaming hardwood floorboards which lead into a well-lit carpeted lounge room, flowing into the generous sizes kitchen/meals area which overlooks the huge deck & large back yard. The functional kitchen offers electric stove & pantry, the bedrooms are carpeted with built in robes & ceiling fans in 2 of them all serviced by a very neat bathroom. With the bonus of cosy gas ducted heating and split system A/C.
The secure backyard offers plenty of space for kids & pets or alternatively an opportunity to extend (STCA). The covered rear deck really increases your living area & is sure to be a favourite place for family gatherings. The package is completed by a secure single garage and plenty of room for the caravan or boat, which really adds up to value buying. Currently leased at $280 per week however there is vacant possession available.
Located in an increasingly popular suburb of the Bellarine Peninsula you will find yourself close to the water, award winning Wineries, Golf courses & everything this fantastic area has to offer.
This is value buying, don't miss your opportunity; call to arrange your inspection.
Insights: 23 Boonderabbi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Come Upstairs & Enjoy the Bay Views
This established 3 bedroom brick home has a huge upstairs rumpus/family room and balcony with spectacular views of the bay and city lights. Tiled entry downstairs opens to a formal lounge and dining area that could easily become a study. Open plan electric kitchen with new appliances and large adjoining meals area. Main bedroom with en-suite and built in robes. Ducted heating and cooling. Outside is a double steel garage and easy care gardens. 5 minutes to the beach, golf course and boat ramp, 10 minutes to the local wineries. Come and enjoy life on the Bellarine.

Description:
Walk To The Beach
Imagine walking 200 metres to the local beach on those hot summer nights. This 3 bedroom brick home is in such a great location close to the waterfront and with local park and shops at the end of the street. Formal lounge and dining area plus family room. Gas kitchen with double pantry. Totally renovated central bathroom. Outside is an updated fernery/patio area. Double carport plus access for caravan or boat. 5 minutes to the golf course and boat ramp. 10 minutes to local wineries. Get away from the city and enjoy the Bellerine lifestyle.
Insights: 28 Caravel Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A complete family lifestyle by the bay
A complete family lifestyle sits within the boundaries of this large property in bayside Clifton Springs. The double block, encompassing approx. 1171sqm, delivers the privilege of space and a level of privacy sought by many. The location offers great convenience for a family with a school bus stop at the end of the street, safe bike trail to Drysdale Primary and a 10' walk to kindergarten.
Key features include a comfortable 3-bedroom home with study and 2 spacious living zones, expansive undercover Alfresco living, solar heated pool, independant multipurpose 'man cave' and 2 double garages. The lovely wide frontage and warm homestead ambiance are inviting on arrival. The brick build is substantial with north-facing living zones that frame and access the Alfresco, pool and garden. A desirable indoor-outdoor lifestyle ideal for entertaining results.
It's a pleasure to cater in the newly refurbished kitchen with walk-in pantry and picture window framing the lifestyle assets. Quality appliances include 750mm Blanco electric oven and gas cooktop, Bosch rangehood and Electrolux dishwasher.
Private master BR with walk-in robe and 2-way en suite at the facade. Two further BRs are zoned to the rear and share a family bathroom. For everyday convenience, the laundry and a separate toilet sit close to the living hub. All wet areas are crisp and fresh. A gas log fire and 2 split systems tailor the climate.
Excellent garaging provides secure spaces for family vehicles and 'toys', and is ideal for a tradie.
* Urban lifestyle property on 1171sqm (approx) with pool, 'man cave' and 2 DLUGs
* Roomy 3BR brick home with lounge/dining, kitchen/meals/living and huge Alfresco zone
* Recently updated kitchen with quality apps, walk-in pantry and views over lifestyle assets
* Master with walk-in robe and en suite, separate minor BR wing
* Solar heated pool, big multipurpose 'man cave', garaging for 'toys', tools and cars
* Family home with the privilege of space and a level of privacy sought by many
Insights: 21-23 Takanna Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Imagine the possibilities!
Serene and private, yet convenient to all of the action, this Clifton Springs property has potential
for stellar ocean and mountain views! Placed over 606 square metres (approx.), this parcel of
land sits only minutes from this charming Bellarine town. Clifton Springs is wonderful for young families with schools right in town and less than a kilometre from Central Road. Launch off the town’s boat ramp, stroll around the marina, splash in the local swimming spot, or visit the neighbouring park and playground. The town’s golf course is also nearby and comes complete with postcard-worthy ocean views. Geelong is just 20 minutes (approx.) away - perfect for a day of shopping, fine dining, top tier entertainment and sports. Clifton Springs is a quick trip to Portarlington, where you can enjoy the town’s famous mussels or catch the proposed ferry to Melbourne. Bellarine is also brimming with wineries, gourmet restaurants and festivals throughout the year. The block is primed and ready for your dream home. Add a second storey (STCA) to discover stunning vistas of Corio Bay and the You Yangs. A wall of sheds at the rear gives storage options and an element of privacy. Offering a carefree lifestyle within minutes of conveniences and attractions, this is an incredible opportunity. All you have to do is take the leap!
Insights: 54 Central Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2006.

Description:
Build your dream home
SALE BY SET DATE - FRIDAY 11TH NOVEMBER 2016
This generous parcel of land measuring 649 square metres (approx.) is delightfully located in the coastal town of Clifton Springs. From your new home, traverse the road and stroll for just a couple of minutes across a footbridge to reach the lush greens and established trees of the Clifton Springs Golf Course with its magnificent bay views. Continue along a convenient walking path a mere stone’s throw away, and you can dip your toes in Port Phillip Bay for yourself. This block of land provides a blank canvas for you to build your dream home, and if you add a second storey (STCA), you will be rewarded with glorious vistas of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs mountain range. The city of Melbourne is also visible across the bay and is just a 90 minute car or ferry ride away (departing from Portarlington). Clifton Springs is a family-friendly town, boasting a range of amenities including playgrounds, reserves, swimming spots and a range of schools, and is conveniently located 20 minutes from Geelong. Opportunities for fishing are aplenty, with a local marina and boat ramp, and golfers will be in their element at the neighbouring course. The Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for its wineries and fine-dining restaurants and offers something for everyone. In Coronae Way, you will be ideally located to enjoy all the town and region have to offer.
Insights: 25 Coronae Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Amazing Views Change Daily!
The bonus of this beautiful property is that the views cannot be lost. From the kitchen of this home the food preparation is a delight, the views are amazing and different every day. The current owners put a lot of thought into the design and planning to be sure that they have a very enjoyable home with all the mod cons. Water views from the front deck, rural views from the back deck. Built by Hotondo Homes who really know how to build quality homes.
Why should you move to Clifton Springs? Well let me tell you, it has everything you need to enjoy a life of leisure and relaxation. Also includes all your daily amenities such as shopping, medical, schools, sporting and recreation.
I have enjoyed living here for nearly 30 years and raised my family in this great environment.
Classy, elegant and complete this home will tick many boxes as it has for this family. Its time for them to allow someone else get the pleasure of this home high on the hill. Remember the views cannot be lost. I'm available to show you through so you can see for yourself what I'm talking about.
Insights: 17 Wintersun Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

ABSOLUTE HAVEN ON APP. 1300 SQM., BEAUTIFUL IN AND OUT, ROOM FOR THE BOAT &7 STAR RATING.
This stylish and gracious home has a wealth of living to delight the new owner and must be inspected to really appreciate the quality, generous proportions and all the extras, close to the jetty , schools and golf club. Wide entrance, open plan area including meals, living and gourmet kitchen, second family room, plus flexible room suitable for theatre room, study or large fourth bedroom, doors open to a fully enclosed undercover entertaining area which overlooks the lush garden. Three bedrooms , the master with WIR and ensuite, the other 2 with BIR'S., central bathroom , laundry and separate toilet. Features include walk in pantry, dishwasher, solar hot water,central heating, 2 split systems,double glazing and LED lighting throughout, sound insulation in some internal walls, loads of storage, high ceilings, matured fruit trees and more. Triple garage and extra space for more. Superb home with so many extras.

Description:
STUNNING HOME STUNNING VIEWS
From an air of sophistication to extraordinary views, this 3 bedroom executive class residence commands attention. Taking full advantage of its lofty position, mountain and bay vistas provide a superb backdrop to everyday life at this established address. Aptly embracing the winter sun, open plan living lends inviting ambience from stunning timber floors. Versatile for use as a huge home office, studio or simply a rumpus, a multi-purpose room below adjoins under-house storage. Gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning and ceiling fans ensure seasonal comfort. Solar power and hot water supply energy savings. Master bedroom pampers its occupants with spectacular sunsets, also a feature of alfresco areas that overlook an expansive backyard. Direct internal access is available from a double garage that is equipped with auto roller door. In close proximity to great schools, a wide array of shops and services plus buses into Geelong, discerning purchasers will not be disappointed.

Description:
As New 3 Bedroom Townhouse!!
Quality built and standing alone is this beautifully kept 3 bedroom property. With open plan living incorporating lounge room plus meals and kitchen areas. These areas overlook the rear yard area and outdoor living space with low maintenance easy care courtyard gardens. All bedrooms are double sized , have robes and ceiling fans. The master bedroom has access to a central bathroom. The property is maintained fastidiously and will suit all buyer groups. Gas heating plus reverse cycle split system air conditioning keeps the home comfortable all year round. New gas hot water service. Rain water tank. This property is an absolute gem and an inspection a must!

Address: 26 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Rare Opportunity - Amazing Golf Course Position
Have you been looking to buy in one of Clifton Springs' most sought after locations? Look no further!
Being presented to the market is this three bedroom brick veneer beauty that literally backs on to the Clifton Springs Golf Course. This home boasts three generously sized bedrooms all with built-in-robes and large windows which allow ample natural light to filter through. Polished floorboards throughout, air-conditioning, an updated bathroom, spacious and well-designed kitchen, single lock-up garage, big laundry and plenty of storage are just some of the many features this house includes.
The north-facing backyard offers views of the second fairway from the kitchen and large sliding doors in the dining room lead you to the deck out the back where you can entertain or simply sit back, relax and take in the view. This home is a golfer's dream - simply walk through the rear gate and on to the fairway.
Properties like this are hard to secure and are very rarely offered with a rear north aspect, this golf course property is a must see today. Call me now and make an appointment to view this property.

Description:
Spacious home with views and potential
Deceptively spacious, this 4-bedroom home sits on the high side of the avenue capitalising on westerly bay views and spectacular sunsets.
Set on 720sqm approx, this blissfully private home has the scope for renovation or development (STCA) and is convenient to bay beaches, the boat ramp and the golf course.
On entry, the open plan, generous proportions and cathedral ceilings have instant appeal. Scenic bay windows in the lounge and master bedroom capture lovely views over the front veranda and across the bay. They also harness the afternoon sun and vibrant sunset tones.
The sunken lounge is particularly spacious providing ample room to spread out and unwind. Further in, open plan living incorporates kitchen and meals, flowing to a rear deck and undercover outdoor entertaining patio.
The storage-laden kitchen features a 900mm Nightingale electric/gas cooker and dishwasher. A powerful Heatcharm wood burner and large skylight boost the ambiance in this airy space.
The parent’s and children's domains are entirely separate. Masters enjoy peace and quiet at the facade with walk-in robe and en suite shower room.
The children’s wing is impressive with a luxury bathroom, featuring large corner spa, shower and vanity, separate toilet and 3 queen-sized bedrooms with built-in robes.
Ducted heating and ceiling fans throughout ensure comfort year round.
The sunny yard is a safe haven for children and pets. There is a single garage and side access provides space to house the caravan or boat securely.
An ideal first family-sized home with space and great potential.
Property currently tenanted until December 2016.
Insights: 3 Takanna Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 54 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Quality Bay Views!
This 3 bedroom home is available to the astute purchaser looking to invest in the area. Potential for capital growth guaranteed. This home is well presented with spacious open plan living which opens onto rear deck & offering quality views of the bay toward Geelong. A perfect spot to enjoy a family BBQ or just some time out relaxing. There is also a second living room. All 3 bedrooms have robes & the central bathroom has access to the master. Central gas heating, air conditioner, excellent storage, single garage with drive through access to the back yard are a few features of this very tidy property.
Insights: 54 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
